item.title: Jogulamba Gadwal Police Crack Property Dispute Murder Case in Just 48 Hours, Arrest Six Accused
item.description:
<![CDATA[Jogulamba Gadwal police swiftly solved a murder case within 48 hours, arresting six individuals. The victim, Sandhya Pogu Ramesh, was killed on February 12, 2025, near Maddur stage. Initially reported as a hit-and-run, the investigation revealed a premeditated murder orchestrated by Ramesh's own brothers.
Ramesh had ongoing property disputes with his brothers, Sandyapogu Gopi and Sandyapogu Mahesh. Tensions escalated after Ramesh and another brother allegedly attempted to murder Mahesh. Seeking...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author
